title: Halloween for Beginner Readers #2: The Itchy Witch
description: Better than Candy - take 2! It's Halloween, but the witch has an itch she can't get rid of. Who can help her? This fun (and funny!) story is perfect for getting your beginner reader in the mood for Hallowe'en. Younger siblings will enjoy it as a read aloud. This early reader focuses on the 'ch' sound at the beginning and end of words. There is a list of those at the end for review, and to help your beginner reader notice the patterns in similar words and sounds. Happy Hallowe'en!
author: Ella May Woodman
